summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 31302, creating Local Improvement District No. 2660, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 28, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 4, being the alley from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive, between Fifteenth Avenue North and Sixteenth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3843 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved May 14, 1913, and published May 21, 1913.
